Class Connect4View

java.lang.Object
connect4.Connect4View
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class Connect4View extends Object implements Observer
This class creates a GUI for the user to interact with, following the functions of a Connect4 game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Connect4View

      public Connect4View(BoardGamesView menuView)
      Allows for an instance of this class to be made and sets up variables when loading Connect4
      Parameters:
      menuView - - a BoardsGameView object used to update the stage

    • Connect4View

      public Connect4View(BoardGamesView menuView, String name1, String name2)
      Allows for an instance of this class to be made and sets up variables for a new Connect4 game
      Parameters:
      menuView - - a BoardsGameView object used to update the stage
      name1 - - a String which represents player 1's name
      name2 - - a String which represents player 2's name

  • Method Details

    • getScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()
      Retrieves the scene of the Connect4 Game
      Returns:
      Scene object which holds the GUI of the Connect4 Game

    • update

      public void update(Observable o, Object arg)
      This method updates the GUI based on the last inputted move which is called whenever the observed object is changed.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      o - -- the observable object
      arg - -- expected an array of two ints which are the coordinates of the last move

    • dropPiece

      private void dropPiece(int x, int y)
      Animates a falling piece when the user makes their move.
      Parameters:
      x - - an int which represents the row the piece lands in
      y - - an int which represents the column the piece goes into

    • disableAll

      private void disableAll()
      Sets all setOnMouseClicked actions to null for each cell

    • setupBoard

      private void setupBoard()
      Sets up Connect4 grid pane, 7x8 cell grid with Circle object preplaced in each cell.

    • updateBoard

      private void updateBoard(char[][] board)
      Updates the grid pane cells based on the model Connect4 board
      Parameters:
      board - - an array of arrays of characters(Connect4 board)

    • createMenu

      private void createMenu(javafx.scene.control.MenuBar menuBar)
      Adds menu items to menu bar
      Parameters:
      menuBar - - MenuBar object which will be added to

    • newGame

      private javafx.scene.Scene newGame(String player1, String player2)
      Creates/loads a game of Connect4 to present as a GUI
      Parameters:
      player1 - - String that represents player1's name
      player2 - - String that represents player2's name
      Returns:
      Scene object to be used on the Super Awesome Games main menu
